title: Review: Western Digital Elements SE 2TB SSD Provides Cheap, Ultra-Portable Storage
description: The WD Elements SE Portable SSD is an ultra-portable SSD (weighing less than one ounce) that offers capacities of up to 2TB. It’s no speed demon, but with the 2TB version going for under $120 it offers cheap, affordable solid state storage that’s ideal for casual use and backups.

title: ‘Frozen Smoke’ Makes Glass Bricks Strong And Super Insulating
